display_name: Any calcium-channel blocker = CCIR or CCBSR or CCBT (SHHS1)
description: Participant taking ANY CALCIUM-CHANNEL BLOCKER = CCIR OR CCBSR OR CCBT within two weeks of the SHHS1 visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
